summary: An ordinance establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Office of the City Comptroller and in the Municipal Court and in the Health, Police, Engineering, Lighting, Building, Executive, Law, Park and Water Depts.; fixing compensation; superseding Ordinance 91600 insofar as in conflict; providing funds by budget item transfers, appropriations and reimbursable appropriation from the Emergencyt Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
